qas.question: What was the name of the project to change the location of I-40 and make a new entrance to the city?
What year was the Core to Shore project voted for to be part of the MAPS program?

context: <a0_0>The "Core-to-Shore" project<a0_0/> was created to relocate I-40 one mile (1.6 km) south and replace it with a boulevard to create a landscaped entrance to the city. This also allows the central portion of the city to expand south and connect with the shore of the Oklahoma River. Several elements of "Core to Shore" were included in the MAPS 3 proposal approved by voters in late <a1_0>2009<a1_0/>.
